REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f0607 reute b f BC-/-FED-SETS-ONE-BILLIO 03-06 0057

TEXT.TITLE: FED SETS ONE BILLION DLR CUSTOMER REPO
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the government securities market to arrange one billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements, a spokesman for the New York Fed said. Fed funds were trading at 5-15/16 pct at the time of the indirect injection of temporary reserves, dealers said. Reuter
